2025.title: city girl
2025.caption: Can’t stop myself from generic beautiful women portraits, but i did also do some cloud & tree practice...! Very happy with the clouds, not so much the tree. Still nice to look back & see how much i’ve improved anyway.

2025.title: morning routine
2025.caption: Art trade piece with my friend randy, who requested vignettes of the jellycat monkey's morning routine. Developing a terminal addiction to gradient maps i fear...

2025.title: scavenger hunt cards
2025.caption: Alice in wonderland themed cards for a picnic day scavenger hunt event.

2025.title: iron fist [marvel rivals]
2025.caption: Supposed to be a lunar new year drawing of marvel rivals’ iron fist. Now it’s a post lny drawing... oops.

2024.title: cathedrals
2024.caption: Quick doodle inspired by a tiktok i saw, about the unknowable sanctity of the walmart deli counter.

2024.title: grade
2024.caption: Instagram post for my job. I was supposed to be studying for a midterm the next day, which is probably why i spent extra time on the shading and details.

2024.title: backgrounds
2024.caption: Some pieces I did for a game jam entry with my friends. We placed #29 for style :p

2024.title: stickup
2024.caption: Entry for an art contest. I won a hoodie for this!

2024.title: athena [hades]
2024.caption: Unfortunately the first personal piece i’ve completed all year. Hades was one of the first games i’ve gotten 100% completion for & athena was definitely hard carrying for most of it.

2024.title: picnic day 110 poster
2024.caption: I did the linework for ucd’s picnic day poster this year! This is actually a rejected copy: i loved gunrock-zilla in the back but it was ultimately cut.

2024.title: picnic day 110 sticker
2024.caption: Sticker design for ucd’s 110th picnic day.

2023.title: fairy face
2023.caption: Not beating the can’t draw a background allegations but I did try more dramatic lighting...! can’t win ’em all...

2023.title: astronaut
2023.caption: Went to a screenprinting studio with my cousin & doodled a little astronaut girl for it. Lines from john keats’ ode to a mockingbird.

2023.title: bread
2023.caption: Croissant girl logo for breadluvr on instagram.

2023.title: prowler [atsv]
2023.caption: Done with copic markers & scanned in with my phone, which i think did the colors extremely dirty!!!

2023.title: girl
2023.caption: Rkgk redraw of a sketch i made in 2019 (4 years ago! wow). Both probably took ~1 hour, so it’s interesting to see the difference in style.

2023.title: jester
2023.caption: I’ve recently developed an addiction to suitu, a mobile dress-up game, & in particular the jester-themed outfit set.

2023.title: picnic day 109 sticker
2023.caption: Sticker design for ucd’s 109th picnic day.

2023.title: happy birthday moon! [genshin]
2023.caption: Birthday gift of a ganyu illustration.

2023.title: golfing
2023.caption: Weird little comic based on a dream i had. Typeset in adobe garamond pro.
